attributes.action: Register Persons convicted of ABG GBH and Domestic Violence
attributes.additional_details:
12 / 11 / 2013 - Take a stand enough is enough
Body:
    My name is Kaylin Mauchlen and i am creating this petition as i want to make is mandatory that if any person has caused someone else ABH GBH or convicted of DV or anything similar their names will go one a register, and the public will be able to see this and keep themselves safe. My aim is 5000 signatures. Lets take a stand, and we will not tolerate this behaviour in out communities or in our own home town.

    Many Thanks
